DOC.brief_title: Prevention Capsular Contracture Using Trental Vitamin E
DOC.detailed_description: This single center , 18-month study 30 woman receive Trental ( pentoxifylline ) 400 milligram three time day combination vitamin E , 400 international unit orally twice daily six month . Subjects begin treatment regimen within four week completion radiation treatment remain study drug six month . Following completion active treatment , subject enter twelve-month observational phase trial evaluate change breast tissue use follow objective tool : Bakers Grade Assessment , Visual Analog Scale ( VAS ) , implant revision loss , breast photograph , adverse event assessment Quality Life tool ( SF-12 ) .
